changeSet.author: max.büning@htw-berlin.de
changeSet.comment: Migrate issue relations to N:M: - Drop old 1:1 relation columns (blocked_by, related_to, duplicate_of) - Add new SET<UUID>-based relation columns: blocks, blocked_by_set, related_to_set, duplicate_of_set, parent_of, child_of
changeSet.sql: ALTER TABLE REMSFAL.issues ADD blocks_set set<uuid>;
ALTER TABLE REMSFAL.issues ADD blocked_by_set set<uuid>;
ALTER TABLE REMSFAL.issues ADD related_to_set set<uuid>;
ALTER TABLE REMSFAL.issues ADD duplicate_of_set set<uuid>;
ALTER TABLE REMSFAL.issues ADD parent_of_set set<uuid>;
ALTER TABLE REMSFAL.issues ADD child_of_set set<uuid>;

rollback.sql: ALTER TABLE REMSFAL.issues ADD blocked_by uuid;
ALTER TABLE REMSFAL.issues ADD related_to uuid;
ALTER TABLE REMSFAL.issues ADD duplicate_of uuid;
